sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均可表示"吃"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: eat, dine, have, consume, devour, gorge, swallow
means: eat ： 普通用词，使用广泛。既可用于人，也可用于动物。
dine ： 正式用词，既可指一日三餐中的任何一餐，也可以指特殊的用餐。
have ： 可与eat换用，但强调一次性的动作。
consume ： 侧重痛痛快快地吃得一干二净，可用于人和动物。
devour ： 指狼吞虎咽地吃，强调吃得既快又彻底。
gorge ： 侧重指拼命地吃或塞，强调吃饱或吃得过量。
swallow ： 主要指吃的整个过程的第二部分"咽"，并常指咀嚼得匆匆忙忙地吃。

sentence.Network_en: Classically, overweight people underestimate the volume of food that they consume.
sentence.Network_cn: 一般来说，超重的人往往低估自己摄入食物的量。

sentence.Network_en: Earthworms consume large amounts of soil, and produce a rich humus, perfect in texture.
sentence.Network_cn: 蚯蚓吃下大量土壤，排出肥力丰富、物理结构理想的腐殖质。

sentence.Network_en: Some of the most efficient refrigerators consume 70 percent less electricity than traditional models.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些极为节能的冰箱比传统型号耗电减少70%。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin consumere, from con- 'altogether' + sumere 'take up'; reinforced by French consumer

entry.def: If you consume something, you eat or drink it.

example.ex: Many people experienced a drop in their cholesterol levels when they consumed oat bran.
example.tran: 很多人食用燕麦麸后胆固醇水平下降了。

example.ex: ...serving chocolate ice-creams for the children to consume in the kitchen.
example.tran: 端上巧克力冰激凌让孩子们在厨房里吃

entry.tran: 消耗，耗费(燃料、能源或时间)
entry.def: To consume an amount of fuel, energy, or time means to use it up.

example.ex: Some of the most efficient refrigerators consume 70 percent less electricity than traditional models.
example.tran: 一些极为节能的冰箱比传统型号耗电减少70%。

example.ex: ...plans which will consume hours of time and deplete your cash reserves.
example.tran: 要花费若干小时并消耗你留存备用的钱的计划

entry.def: If a fire consumes a building, it completely destroys it.

entry.tran: (使)沉溺，(使)沉迷，(使)充满(感情或思想)
entry.def: If a feeling or idea consumes you, it affects you very strongly indeed.

sentences.sentence: "Some people can down a pound of meat in the course of one meal"

means.word_mean: 2. serve oneself to, or consume regularly;

sentences.sentence: "I don't take sugar in my coffee"
"this car consumes a lot of gas"
"They run through 20 bottles of wine a week"
"The effort to pass the exam consumed all his energy"

stems_affixes.word_buile: consume使着迷+ing……的→adj.强烈的,分量重的
presume[v.假定,假设,认为,揣测,滥用,擅自行动]+able……的→adj.可假定的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 消耗;吃完,喝光;[with]使着迷;烧毁
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+sume拿,取→全拿完→消耗[完],沉迷于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 再继续,重新开始;再用;恢复
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再+sume拿,取→重新拿起→再用;恢复
re再+assume[v.假装;假定,设想;承担;呈现,采取]→v.再假定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 假装;假定,设想;承担;呈现,采取
stems_affixes.word_buile: as加强动作+sume拿,取→拿住→认为是……[假定],承担

stems_affixes.value_cn: 假定,假设,认为,揣测,滥用,擅自行动
stems_affixes.word_buile: pre预先+sume拿,取→预先拿住→假定

Sentence.sentence: ZEH communities are the leading edge of technologies that might someday create houses that produce as much energy as they consume.
They are only charged for the amount of power they consume on rainy days
"Everyone in the U.S. is consuming salt far in excess of what is good for them," says lead author Dr. Kirsten Bibbins-Domingo of UCSF.
Indians likewise had the traditional life taken from them by white settlers who often encourage them to consume alcohol to prevent them from fighting back.
Beef consumes far more water to produce than vegetables
About 70% of this is consumed by the global agriculture sector, and the level of use will continue to rise over the coming decades.

means.word_mean: 消耗, 消费, 耗尽 （燃料、能量、时间等）

sentences.en: Arguing about details consumed many hours of the committee's valuable time.
sentences.cn: 争论细节问题耗费了委员会数小时宝贵的时间。

sentences.en: The fire soon consumed the wooden buildings.
sentences.cn: 大火很快就把那些木制建筑物烧毁了。

jushi.english: The children consumed all the hamburgers.
jushi.chinese: 孩子们把汉堡全部吃完了。

jushi.english: The fire soon consumed the wooden buildings.
jushi.chinese: 大火很快就把那些木制建筑物烧毁了。
